means: [医]链孢霉属：子囊菌纲真菌，为球壳目(Sphaeriales)粪壳科(Sordariaceae)的一属，包括面包霉，它能将色氨酸转化为烟酸，被广泛用于遗传学和酶的研究

sentence.Network_en: The life cycle of Neurospora is shown in Fig 1.1.
sentence.Network_cn: 图11概括了链孢霉的生活史.

sentence.Network_en: Neurospora can be grown in test tubes containing a very simple culture medium.
sentence.Network_cn: 链孢霉可以在含有一种很简单的培养基的试管中生长.

sentence.Network_en: An osmotic mutant of Neurospora was permeable to polymers of molecular weight 18500.
sentence.Network_cn: 脉孢壳属的渗透突变体能透过分子量为18500的聚合物.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Study on Xylose Fermentation by Neurospora crassa粗糙脉孢菌Neurospora crassa木糖发酵的研究
链孢霉病的发生与防治链孢霉病的发生链孢霉(Neurospora)亦叫脉孢霉、粗糙脉孢霉(N.crassa)、 红面包霉,俗称红霉菌,红娥子,常见的有粗糙脉孢菌和间型脉孢.

neurospora 脉孢菌属, neurospora 链孢霉属, neurospora 脉孢霉属

means.word_mean: 1. genus of fungi with black perithecia used extensively in genetic research; includes some forms with orange spore masses that cause severe damage in bakeries
